review: Mr. Heaton and his team is one of the best injury law firms and more here in Las Vegas. I was in a really bad car accident on New Years and Mr. Heaton did not hesitate to come to my house to introduce himself and to make this process easy as he though about my health and well being after what I had just experienced. He also had his assistance to come to my house as well for any paperwork that needed to be signed also. Him and his team communicated with me throughout the entire process. My entire experience was wonderful and smooth. I’m extremely happy with the outcome I received and the continued support. If you are in need of a honest trustworthy lawyer and firm, Mr. Heaton and his team are the way to go. Thank you Mr. Heaton and his supportive team for all that you have done for me.
